p: 3-benzamido-N-(2-bromo-6-methyl-4-(pentafluorothio)phenyl)-2-fluorobenzamide ( 4c). This follows the general method. The residue was purified by column chromatography on a silica gel (Hexane:EtOAc = 10:1) to give the desired diamide 4c as a brown solid (51.2 mg, 54% yield). mp 209~210 °C; 1H-NMR (500 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 8.69–8.63 (m, 1H), 8.17–8.07 (m, 2H), 7.94–7.89 (m, 3H), 7.89–7.83 (m, 1H), 7.67 (d, J = 2.5 Hz, 1H), 7.64–7.59 (m, 1H), 7.56–7.52 (m, 2H), 7.40–7.35 (m, 1H), 2.43 (s, 3H); 13C-NMR (100 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 165.6, 161.0, 152.4, 149.9, 138.9, 137.0, 134.0, 132.6, 129.1, 128.0, 127.6, 127.2, 127.1, 127.0, 126.5, 126.3, 125.4, 125.3, 121.4, 120.5, 120.4, 20.0; 19F-NMR (470 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 82.97 (quin, 1F, J SF–SF4, J = 150.5 Hz, SF), 63.35 (d, 4F, J SF4–SF, J = 150.0 Hz, SF 4), −130.98 (s, 1F); HRMS (EI) calcd. for C 21H 15BrF 6N 2O 2S 551.9942, found 551.9954 (see Supplementary Materials).
